Plot: A girl is trapped inside her family's lakeside retreat and becomes unable to contact the outside world as supernatural forces haunt the house with mysterious energy and consequences.
Title: Silent House
Writer: Gustavo Hernández (film "La casa muda"), Laura Lau (screenplay), Oscar Estévez (original screen play)
Actors: Elizabeth Olsen, Adam Trese, Eric Sheffer Stevens, Julia Taylor Ross
tomatoConsensus: Silent House is more technically proficient and ambitious than most fright-fests, but it also suffers from a disappointing payoff.
